item.name: Get room options with policies and meal/cancellation facets

request.name: Get room options with policies and meal/cancellation facets

description.content:
Required body fields: `hotelCode`, `checkInDate`, `checkOutDate`.
Optional body fields: `destinationCode`, `countryCode`, `nationality`, `currency`, `rooms`.
Required body fields: `hotelCode`.

item.name: Validate selected room rates and return bookable result

request.name: Validate selected room rates and return bookable result

description.content:
Required body fields: `hotelCode`, `rateKeys[]`.
If you send raw supplier rate keys (not opaque tokens), also send `sessionId` and `groupCode`.

response.name: Prebook result with refreshed room options/facets

item.name: Complete hotel booking with selected rates and guests

request.name: Complete hotel booking with selected rates and guests

description.content:
Books hotel inventory through Aoryx and optionally processes local services:
transfer booking, excursion booking, and EFES insurance policy issuance.
For insurance, partners should send traveler form inputs.
Required top-level body fields: `hotelCode`, `destinationCode`, `rooms[]`.
Required room fields: `roomIdentifier`, `adults`, `rateKey`, `guests[]`, `price{gross,net}`.

Required body fields: `checkInDate`, `checkOutDate`, and one of `destinationCode` or `hotelCode`.
Optional body fields: `countryCode`, `nationality`, `currency`, `rooms`.

Required body field: one of `destinationLocationCode` or `destinationName`.
Optional body fields: `transferType`, `paxCount`, `travelDate`.

Body is optional.
Optional body field: `limit` (default 200, max 200).

item.name: Get travel insurance quote through Efes

request.name: Get travel insurance quote through Efes

description.content:
Required body fields: `startDate`, `endDate`, `territoryCode`, `riskAmount`, `riskCurrency`, `travelers[]`.
Traveler required field for quote: `age`.

Public B2B gateway for Megatours suppliers. All supplier calls are brokered by Megatours.
Integration order:
1) GET /v1/destinations
2) POST /v1/hotels/search
3) POST /v1/hotels/room-details
4) POST /v1/hotels/prebook
5) POST /v1/hotels/book
Optional addons:
- POST /v1/transfers/search
- POST /v1/excursions/search
- POST /v1/insurance/quote
